field.name: orderby
field.label: Images ordering by
field.description: custom images ordering in gallery. Native images ordering you can change in images manager

field.name: items
field.label: Amount to display
field.description: how much slideshow items to show on the front end. For example you can select random value in ordering option and set 5 here, as result you will see in slideshow 5 random images from target gallery

field.name: preload
field.label: Lazy Load
field.description: this option enable or disable lazy load function, which make loading of the thumbnails more comfortable. When you enable Lazy Load it is loading only part of the thumbnails which you see on screens and in the case if you scroll page to the next part of the gallery thumbnails it is continue loading process

field.name: preloadImage
field.label: Loader icon
field.description: here you can select icon for the loader which you gonna see during thumbnails preloading process

field.name: preloadEffect
field.label: Lazy Load Fade
field.description: this function enable or disable fade effect for the thumbnails during reloading process with lazy load function

field.name: galleryWidth
field.label: Gallery Width
field.description: width of the general gallery panel, place where gallery show all generated thumbnails. Combining values of the gallery and thumbnails width you can make gallery with thumbnails matrix. You can put images in 2 , 3 .... or any amount of columns you wish. Acceptable values in pixels of percents

field.name: galleryAlign
field.label: Gallery Align
field.description: here you can select one from the 3 values [left, center, right] for alignment gallery thumbnails on the frame

field.name: galleryBgColor
field.label: Gallery Background Color
field.description: background color for the gallery panel. When you click on this field you’ll see ajax color selector

field.name: galleryPadding
field.label: Gallery Padding
field.description: padding for every side of the gallery. Every side could have different padding value. Value 0 for no padding case. Only integer values

field.name: galleryBorder
field.label: Gallery Border
field.description: configuration of the gallery border consist of three parameters border width, type and color

field.name: galleryShadow
field.label: Gallery Shadow
field.description: configuration of the gallery shadow consist of three parameters width, color and opacity value for the shadow

field.name: thumbHoverEffect
field.label: Hover Effect
field.description: here you can select hover animation effect of the thumbnails

field.name: thumbStyle
field.label: Hover Layout
field.description: every one from selected above animation effect have few pre - defined layout of the title elements. In some layouts you’ll see title panel and click here button, some of them have also images description text

field.name: thumbStyleBgColor
field.label: Style Background Color
field.description: background color for the shutter of the animation effect. Shutter - it’s slice which cover thumbnail image during animation process

field.name: thumbStyleBgOpacity
field.label: Style Background Opacity
field.description: opacity value for shutter of the animation effect. Shutter – it’s slice which cover thumbnail image during animation process

field.name: clickText
field.label: Click Button Label
field.description: here you can customize text label of the click button

field.name: innerborder
field.label: Inner Border
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails inner border consist of three parameters border width, type and color

field.name: border
field.label: Border
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails border consist of three parameters border width, type and color

field.name: shadow
field.label: Shadow
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails shadow consist of three width, color and opacity value for the shadow

field.name: hoverinnerborder
field.label: Hover Inner Border
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails hover inner border consist of three parameters border width, type and color

field.name: hoverborder
field.label: Hover Border
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails hover border consist of three parameters border width, type and color

field.name: hovershadow
field.label: Hover Shadow
field.description: configuration of the thumbnails hover shadow consist of three width, color and opacity value for the shadow

field.name: thumb_width
field.label: Thumbnail width
field.description: width of the thumbnail images

field.name: thumb_height
field.label: Thumbnail height
field.description: height of the thumbnail images

field.name: thumb_type_resizing
field.label: Resizing shape
field.description: select the way of the gallery thumbnails resizing. In the case of PROPORTIONAL value thumbnail will be resized proportional. In the case of the CROP values thumbnails cropping according to predefined size.

field.name: thumb_resize_position
field.label: Thumbnail resizing align
field.description: required option in the case of CROP value in resizing shape. This options responsible for direction of the displacement during rezing process of the gallery thumbnails.

field.name: thumb_color
field.label: Thumbnail background color
field.description: color could be specify in hex format (for example: #616161). To change color click on the color selector and pick up required color

field.name: thumbPadding
field.label: Thumbnail padding
field.description: padding for every side of the thumbnail. Every side could have different padding value. Value 0 for no padding case. Only integer values

field.name: showPagination
field.label: Pagination
field.description: this function enable pagination functionality onf the front end of the gallery

field.name: countPagination
field.label: Amount on page
field.description: here you can define amount of the images per gallery pagination page

field.name: paginationPosition
field.label: Pagination position
field.description: poistion of the pagination navigation buttons. You can publish it on top, bottom or top and bottom positions at the same time

field.name: paginationTheme
field.label: Theme
field.description: hee you can one from the predefined pagination navigation buttons theme

field.name: goToTopPagination
field.label: Scroll Up
field.description: in the case if you enable this option gallery scroll up page to the top of the gallery after changin of the pagination page

field.name: nextTextPagination
field.label: Next label
field.description: here you can define text label for the next button, support HTML

field.name: prevTextPagination
field.label: Prev label
field.description: here you can define text label for the prev button, support HTML

field.name: showPaginationPagesInBar
field.label: Pages in line
field.description: here you can select amount of the pages which pagination elements gonna show in line without splitter. For the cases when you have big amount of pages pagination navigation bar will show current page and few of them on the each side, after every this block it's show split dots

field.name: lightboxStyle
field.label: Lightbox Style
field.description: Here you can select lightbox style for your gallery. Mobile light box support mobile touch screen devices
field.option: Mobile (no video and additional functions support)

field.name: lightboxDesc
field.label: Lightbox Text
field.description: here you can select what text you wish to show in the lightbox below image: title, title with image description or just description

field.name: big_type_resizing
field.label: Resizing shape
field.description: select the way of the gallery images resizing. In the case of PROPORTIONAL value image will be resized proportional. In the case of the CROP values images cropping according to predefined size

field.name: big_width
field.label: Image width
field.description: here you can specify width for the gallery images (this value could be lower then width of the original image)

field.name: big_height
field.label: Image height
field.description: here you can specify height for the gallery images (this value could be lower then height of the original image)

field.name: big_color
field.label: Image background color
field.description: color could be specify in hex format (for example: #616161). To change color click on the color selector and pick up required color

field.name: big_resize_position
field.label: Image resizing align
field.description: required option in the case of CROP value in resizing shape. This options responsible for direction of the displacement during rezing process of the gallery image

field.name: lightboxBg
field.label: Custom lightbox bg
field.description: configuration of the lightbox background and opacity

field.name: lightboxIframeWidth
field.label: Lightbox Iframe Width
field.description: Width of the Iframe in lightbox, for the cases if you select this link values: Page in lightbox, Video, Google Map

field.name: lightboxIframeHeight
field.label: Lightbox Iframe Height
field.description: Height of the Iframe in lightbox, for the cases if you select this link values: Page in lightbox, Video, Google Map

field.name: lightboxInlineWidth
field.label: Lightbox Inline Width
field.description: Width of the Iframe in lightbox, for the cases if you select this link values: Description in lightbox

field.name: lightboxInlineHeight
field.label: Lightbox Inline Height
field.description: Height of the Iframe in lightbox, for the cases if you select this link values: Description in lightbox

field.name: lightboxTextCurrent
field.label: Counter label
field.description: images couter label. Here you can use build in tags: {current} - which gonna be replaced by number of the current image, {total} - it is total amount of the images. Use space if you wish to leave this label empty

field.name: lightboxTextPrevious
field.label: Previous label
field.description: previous navigation button text label. Use space if you wish to leave this label empty

field.name: lightboxTextNext
field.label: Next label
field.description: next navigation button text label. Use space if you wish to leave this label empty

field.name: lightboxTextClose
field.label: Close label
field.description: close button text label. Use space if you wish to leave this label empty
